name: Tribal Defense
description:
This game is about a man in the late 1800's defending his land from the people abroad trying to colonize his land for their own benefits, he fends them off with spears. This game got made in a total of a day of work for the Mini Ludum Dare #69 with the theme being Colonization, ps. this was my first time ever doing graphics for my own game.

Controls
Up and down arrows to move down and up and press the Spacebar to throw spears at the abroad enemy. Letting even one of them past your defense line will result in a game over!

DEFEND YOUR LAND!
